page.title: 14RECREATION AT CRESTWOOD
page.content:
{The Crestwood Centre}is used for a variety of activities. People from the local area and beyond use it out of school hours for sport;for learning about subjects such as computing, typing,French, German, yoga, woodwork, etc. There are slimnastics and aerobic classes, a gardening club, an 'Over 55 s' club, 'Meet a Mum' Association, and a Gingerbread group (for one parent families). It also acts as a centre for a youth club, a creche, and a playgroup for pre-school children. Moreover, the community hall can be hired for family parties and wedding receptions etc..
.
